Title: The Circle Of Driving Again
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Alex Barnow, Lauren Bans (executive story editor), Matt Mira (executive story editor), Erik Weiner (executive story editor), Aaron Kaczander (story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Murray teaches Adam to drive, while Erica needs help with her social life at school.
